name: Demonpact: Clarice
description:
OwO NO!!

Two furry losers summon a demon girl! Now they have to find someone to take their place as her demonic sacrifice.


As the story unfolds, a sizable reward will be placed on their heads.
The police, bounty hunters, vigilantes, garbage cans, formless amalgams and other devilish foes will commit dastardly deeds to seize this delectable bounty.

This game doesn’t take anything seriously! Making fun of everyone, everything at any time.
Play it if you dare! I just hope your mom doesn’t read any of the deep lore.

FEATURES

- 33 recruitable characters with unique play styles.

- Unconventional turn based strategy.
- Visual novel inspired decision making.
- Every decision you make will ACTUALLY IMPACT THE GAME!
- 10 different endings!
- A smorgasbord of easter eggs and secret stuff.
- About 8 hours long for your initial playthrough (less for you speed runny types).
- About 25 hours to do and find everything.
- It’s free.
